function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Decrease in tourism due to pandemic","Impact":"Significant financial losses and reduced economic activity","Mitigation":"Promoting domestic tourism, implementing health protocols, and providing financial support to affected businesses","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and vaccination programs","People":"Tourists, local businesses, and employees in the tourism industry","Owner":"Government, tourism industry associations, and health authorities"},{"Description":"Negative impact on hotel industry in urban areas","Impact":"Economic downturn and job losses in the hotel sector","Mitigation":"Diversifying hotel operations, promoting local tourism, and implementing health and safety measures","Technologies":"Online booking platforms, digital marketing, and contactless payment systems","People":"Hotel employees, international and domestic tourists, and hotel investors","Owner":"Hotel management, tourism boards, and local government"},{"Description":"Exacerbation of social disparities and inequalities","Impact":"Increased socioeconomic vulnerability and unequal access to resources","Mitigation":"Investing in education, social welfare programs, and employment support","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, remote work tools, and digital financial services","People":"Low-income individuals, families with COVID-19 patients, and marginalized communities","Owner":"Social welfare organizations, educational institutions, and government"}]}
